name: Crazy Plane Craft
description:
Crazy Plane Craft is Control your plane and collect as many as stars possible. It is an airplane game. There are number of different obstacles throughout the game, so, DO NOT hit obstacle otherwise your plane will crash. Star collection score increases as long as you stay alive.
Crazy Plane Craft tap anywhere on the screen to avoid incoming cloud, plane game, and earn one point for each plane you pass. Your air plane will appear to steadily accelerate as it approaches the speed of light airplane, and then you are really put to the test. Earn the highest points the essence of the game is to avoid as many planes as possible in plane simulator.

Crazy Plane Craft In this simple yet surprisingly addictive air craft game. Plane craft, It is your job to direct airplanes to runways while avoiding collisions.

Crazy Plane Craft this will be the awesome journey to earn many fight plan, points as many you can in this crazy Plane Craft game, aero plane you are going to fly a crazy single seated fighter plane because you are a mad pilot. Plane simulator you have no travelers and no assistants. Fly the plane. It is your own time to have endless fun. Sounds crazy to be an insane pilot, right? There is unlimited scores you can get in this game will the winner. This is an endless insanity. It takes skill to control your plane. Crazy Plane Craft is Very simple game but very addictive game.


Features:
• Leader-boards and achievements
• Smooth plane controls
• Multilevel
• Multiple airplanes
• Interesting environment
• Clouds every where
